Mr. Holt Riddleberger, Director

1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington, D. C. 20036
Docket 17159
Dear Holt
Coimnents in the new proposal regarding FM translator and booster
services appear to be due February 17th. Roger Peterson v/ill be sending
you a brief memo in this regard. Perhaps we should work with the EducaÂ¬
tional Radio Division so that I am sending a copy of this letter to Jim
Fellows also
We are enclosing a copy of the FCC press release announcing the
rule making proceeding. The notice is expected to be available within the
next few days and we will forward it to you.
With best regards
Sincerely yours.
Oscar Reed, Jr
ORimfb
Enel.
C: Mei
Messrs. Marquis and Fellows
